goals.active: Infiltrate the bandit cave southeast of the city.
goals.complete: I discovered important information from the thieves. First, the Ministry Guard has been releasing prisoners and sending them out to join a growing band of criminals. Second, the ringleader is planning an arson attack on Divinity's Reach. He's targeting either the military hospital or the orphanage.

goals.active: Tell Captain Thackeray that bandits plan to attack the city.
goals.complete: I warned Captain Thackeray about the impending attack on the orphanage and the hospital. We had to act quickly. Logan sent Lieutenant Francis with some soldiers in one direction, while he and I went in the other.
